result.title: ReMESH framework
result.description: A ReMESH framework for emergency resources supply chain ERSC management will be disseminated in a reportReports on the developed emergency resilience models and tools will be produced including a report to provide guidelines on the use of the ERSC assessment framework with support models and software codes and a report of research findings for addressing SO7 including empirical studies and case study examples The deliverable also includes activities on ERSC modelling and simulation and application Reports will be updated on 6month basisThe findings will be submitted to journals or conference for publication
